content.question: In context, the reference to “strength” and “length” in line 13 serves to suggest that what had previously been

choices.label: a point of contention between the lovers has now been resolved
a source of attraction has ceased to be so
a notion shared by the lovers has now been forgotten
a difference between the lovers has now been erased

content.answer: a difference between the lovers has now been erased

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
